metadata.title: CVE-2020-23273 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-buffer overflow in the randomize_iparp function in edit_packet.c. ofTcpreplay v4.3.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via acrafted pcap.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
